ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def OnCustomLocalEntregaExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common.Components import LinkDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import ListItem linkDefinition = command.OutputDefinition linkDefinition.Parameters["ABRANGENCIA"] = "CAPA" linkDefinition.Parameters["ENTREGA"] = 0 #linkDefinition.Parameters["STATUS"] = ListItem(entity.Fields["STATUS"]).Index #linkDefinition.Parameters["CLIENTE"] = entity["CLIENTE"].GetInt32() #linkDefinition.Parameters["PEDIDO"] = entity.Fields["HANDLE"] #linkDefinition.Parameters["ATUAL"] = entity["DESTINATARIOPADRAOx"].GetInt32()
